entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 3:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow at times heavy mixed with rain beginning late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
